title: La Cite de L'indicible Peur
abstract: Note: Adapted from 'La cite de l'indcible peur' by Jean Ray.
description: Mickey, a dangerous mobster, has been arrested 'by chance' by Triquet, a rather insignificant police officer. Mickey is condemned to death but manages to escape. Triquet is ordered to trace him all the way to the village of Barges in Auvergne (central France).  Credits: Producer, Paul Laffargue ; director, Jean-Pierre Mocky ; writers, Jean-Pierre Mocky, Gerard Klein ; photography, Eugen Schuftan ; music, Gerard Calvi ; editor, Marguerite Renoir. Cast: Bourvil, Jean-Louis Barrault, Francis Blanche, Veronique Nordey, Jacques Dufilho, Rene-Louis Lafforgue, Jean Poiret, Raymond Rouleau.
